description:
Matsuoka suffers a dismal defeat against Midori. Yukimura attempts to avenge him, but he does not stand a chance against Midori, and he tastes humiliation as well. The success of the team comes down to Tachibana`s battle against Midori.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima, Kimi no Kokoro o Shihaisuru Mono
今, 君の心を支配するもの
